mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(email, password, username, portfolio, gitHub) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{portfolio}, #{gitHub})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, username = #{username}, portfolio = #{portfolio}, gitHub = #{gitHub} WHERE id = #{id}
